title: 80pc RLNG flows restore to power sector: Hammad
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 03 (APP): Minister for Energy Hammad Azhar Saturday said that 80 percent RLNG flows have been restored to power sector.
4th day of Dry Docking update:
RLNG flows restored to 80%.
Zero forced/unannounced load shedding in most areas since 5 pm yesterday i.e. 3rd day of dry docking.
— Hammad Azhar (@Hammad_Azhar) July 3, 2021
In a twee, the minister said “ Zero forced/unannounced load shedding in most areas since 5 pm yesterday i.e. 3rd day of dry docking”.
